alethinophidia.userInterface

Class OptionsMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • alethinophidia.userInterface.OptionsMenu

  • public class OptionsMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls options menu in game. All settings are set via GameSettings instance created in GameView.
    Author:
    £ukasz Piotrowski
